code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddTask=()=>{const[title,setTitle]=useState('');const[description,setDescription]=useState('');const[dueDate,setDueDate]=useState('');const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();const newTask={title,description,dueDate};axios.post('/api/tasks',newTask).then(response=>{setTitle('');setDescription('');setDueDate('');console.log('Task added:',response.data);}).catch(error=>console.error('Error adding task:',error));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Add New Task"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Title",value:title,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{placeholder:"Description",value:description,onChange:e=>setDescription(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",value:dueDate,onChange:e=>setDueDate(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Add Task"})]});};export default AddTask;
